meanings.sent1: The phagocytotic cells engulfed the harmful bacteria.
meanings.sent2: The immune system relies on phagocytotic processes to fight infections.
meanings.sent3: The phagocytotic defenders in the body were like tiny warriors battling intruders.
meanings.sent4: Her phagocytotic ability to clear out clutter in her room was impressive.
meanings.sent5: The phagocytotic nature of the vacuum cleaner sucked up all the dirt effortlessly.

meanings.sent1: The phagocytotic white blood cells were ready to attack any invaders.
meanings.sent2: Certain immune cells are phagocytotic, helping to keep the body healthy.
meanings.sent3: The superhero's phagocytotic powers allowed him to devour villains with ease.
meanings.sent4: Her phagocytotic appetite for knowledge led her to read books non-stop.
meanings.sent5: The phagocytotic nature of the sponge absorbed all the spilled liquid in seconds.
